title: Netflix rolls out a new “Two Thumbs Up” button for better recommendations
content:
Netflix is one of the most popular streaming services, offering a huge catalog of TV shows and movies. But this immense library is also known to induce choice fatigue, with users struggling to make up their minds on what to watch next. Netflix is well aware of this issue, and over time the streaming service

The post Netflix rolls out a new “Two Thumbs Up” button for better recommendations appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Netflix is rolling out a new Two Thumbs Up button on Android, iOS, TV, and the web. The button appears next to the like/dislike buttons.
